title: Happy Birthday, Nozomi-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Nozomi-chan, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thanks, Emma-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Today, I’m going to spoil you all day long~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Spoil...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yup! First, we’re going to have a picnic in the park and eat sandwiches. After lunch, we’ll lie down on the grass. My lap pillow is approved by Kanata-chan~! Then, I’ll sing a lullaby and stroke your hair until you fall asleep...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>W-Wait! I appreciate the sentiment! I mean, I’m really happy that you thought about this plan, but I’m not really into that kind of thing...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You just appreciate the sentiment...? You don’t want to be spoiled...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Um...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Nozomi-chan... I really want to spoil you. You always work so hard... Please...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>O-Okay! Today, I’ll let myself be spoiled by you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
